CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Bus Stations relative to Ferry Services?
SRP.A: Bus Stations is {below} Ferry Services in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ferry Services relative to Bus Stations?
SRP.A: Ferry Services is {above} Bus Stations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Car Rentals relative to Bus Stations?
SRP.A: Car Rentals is {below} Bus Stations in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Bus Stations}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Car Rentals}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Bus Stations's maximum Luggage Loss Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Bus Stations's maximum Luggage Loss Rate is in {1964}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ferry Services's maximum Luggage Loss Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ferry Services's maximum Luggage Loss Rate is in {1953}.

NC.Q: Between 1954 and 1958, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 1954 and 1959?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1954 and 1958 was {lower} than between 1954 and 1959.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1958, did the total Luggage Loss Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1955 and 1964?
NC.A: The change in total luggage loss rate between 1956 and 1958 was {smaller} than between 1955 and 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1955, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 1956 and 1957?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1953 and 1955 was {higher} than between 1956 and 1957.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1963, did the total Luggage Loss Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1955 and 1962?
NC.A: The change in total luggage loss rate between 1958 and 1963 was {smaller} than between 1955 and 1962.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Bus Stations} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Bus Stations and Ferry Services first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Bus Stations and Ferry Services first exchanged leading positions in {1953}.
